sourcesContent: import SaveOutlinedIcon from '@mui/icons-material/SaveOutlined'; function EditableRow({handleEditFormChange, editedFormData, saveEditedContact}) { return ( handleEditFormChange(event)} /> handleEditFormChange(event)} /> handleEditFormChange(event)} /> {/* console.log(contact)} style={{ color: "#028ae9", cursor: "pointer", marginRight: 20, }} /> handleDelete(contact._id)} style={{ color: "red", cursor: "pointer", }} /> */} ) } export default EditableRow
